extendedInfo.description: The damn zombies are coming again! ! !And this time they are becoming more! ! !Donât let them eat your head! ! !Take up your weapons and fight! ! !Your fingers are your weapons! ! !Tap to kill them! ! !Pop Zombie is a vertical match-3 game. One zombie head is one unit in this game. Tap to match 3 or more zombie heads to make them disappear! But they will appear continuously and endlessly.
